dt: {bc}a mariposa lily ({it}Calochortus nuttallii{/it}) of western North America having mostly white or in some areas mostly yellow flowers mottled with a darker color

et: {it}sego{/it} the bulb of the sego lily, from Southern Paiute {it}siγoʔo{/it}
shortdef: a mariposa lily (Calochortus nuttallii) of western North America having mostly white or in some areas mostly yellow flowers mottled with a darker color
